name: Moji MONSTERS
description:
Moji MONSTERS is a speed game

Touch the emoji characters as soon as possible to beat the timer.

With each new level the game gets harder with more characters to find.

When you get the hang of it, then you have to deal with the Monsters! A variety of Moji MONSTERS offer higher scoring levels, but its much harder to find them!

Can you beat the Moji MONSTERS to get the highest score on the highest level?

Good luck!

You'll need it!
